org.agreement_technologies.common.map_landmarks

Interface Landmarks

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LandmarksImp

    public interface Landmarks
    Landmarks is the main interface to calculate and work with landmarks.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      static int ALL_ORDERINGS 
      static int NECESSARY_ORDERINGS

      Gets the total number of single and disjunctive landmarks.

      Removes cycles in the LG.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrderings

        java.util.ArrayList<LandmarkOrdering> getOrderings(int type,
                                                 boolean onlyGoals)
        Retrieves all the orderings between landmarks in the LG.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of orderings to return (NECESSARY_ORDERINGS, REASONABLE_ORDERINGS or ALL_ORDERINGS)
        onlyGoals - If true, return only orderings that affect the task goals; otherwise, return all the orederings
        Returns:
        List of orderings between landmarks
        Since:
        1.0

        Removes cycles in the LG.
        Since:

      • getNodes

        java.util.ArrayList<LandmarkNode> getNodes()
        Retrieves nodes of the LG.
        Returns:
        List of landmark nodes (single and disjunctive landmarks)
        Since:
        1.0

      • numGlobalNodes

        int numGlobalNodes()
        Gets the total number of single and disjunctive landmarks.
        Returns:
        Number of landmarks of the LG
        Since:
        1.0

        int numTotalNodes()
        Returns current number of landmarks (during plan construction).
        Returns:
        Number of landmarks of the LG
